strategy: Replace the gradient boosting model with a deep neural network (DNN) architecture using fully connected layers with ReLU activations. Introduce batch normalization and dropout layers to improve generalization. Use a structured feature input pipeline where numerical features are normalized using z-score scaling, and categorical features are one-hot encoded with dimensionality reduction via PCA. Train the DNN with time-based cross-validation and employ learning rate scheduling to stabilize training. Monitor validation R² during training to detect overfitting early.

import numpy as np
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split, TimeSeriesSplit
from sklearn.preprocessing import StandardScaler, OneHotEncoder
from sklearn.compose import ColumnTransformer
from sklearn.pipeline import Pipeline

categorical_columns = X_train.select_dtypes(include=['object']).columns

X_val[numerical_columns] = X_val[numerical_columns].fillna(X_val[numerical_columns].median())
